amendment.description: Page 63, line 6, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $104,235,000) (increased by $104,235,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 115-297 to provide $104,235,000 to restore funding to EPA's Science and Technology account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (NC) amendment (A068) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Price (NC) amendment (A068) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A068) offered by Mr. Price (NC).
